long_description: Pitch the three-season, freestanding Big Agnes Rabbit Ears 4 tent at your base camp or car-camping site and enjoy ample space and reliable protection from bugs and rain for 4 happy campers. Large single door features 2 closure options: close the mesh panel to enhance ventilation while stopping the bugs, or zip up the polyester layer for privacy and warmth. Quick Sash on the tent body stows the unzipped door out of the way when not in use. Reflective guylines and reflective webbing on tent corners aid nighttime visibility; color-coded webbing and buckles help make setting up easy and straightforward. Ripstop polyester fly and polyester floor feature a waterproof polyurethane coating; seams are sealed with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape. Lightweight DAC aluminum pole system with press fit connectors; plastic clips and sleeves attach tent body to pole frame. Big Agnes Rabbit Ears 4 tent features 10 lightweight aluminum hook stakes, 8 interior mesh storage pockets and gear loft loops. Footprint (sold separately) extends the life of your tent floor by helping protect it from abrasive wear and tear.
short_description: Pitch the three-season, freestanding Big Agnes Rabbit Ears 4 tent at your base camp or car-camping site and enjoy ample space and reliable protection from bugs and rain for 4 happy campers.
